name: HoustonLibrary
0:
”Alexa, ask Houston Library to find Harry Potter.”
”Alexa, ask Houston Library to tell me about Animal Farm.”
”Alexa, ask Houston Library to find Redwall.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: houston library
des: Quickly search the Houston Public Library for available books. When you find a book you like, you can send detailed information to the Alexa App. This skill automatically filters books that are on hold or checked out. Simply search by title of the book to discover which libraries have it in stock. This skill is designed to work with the Alexa Smartphone App and is no way affiliated with the Houston Public Library System.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
